slides.content1: Provides quality computer training and IT solutions, helping youth, individuals, companies, and businesses acquire enough ICT knowledge through well structured, standard learning materials and conducive environment, thereby making them becoming lifelong champions in IT-related skills.
slides.content2: Assisting Microsoft and Andela to achieve their goals in running an ALC x Microsoft 4Afrika Skillslab Program to upskill 3000 technology upskill final year tertiary students and fresh graduates with knowledge in advanced technologies; DevOps and artificial intelligence (AI) in readiness for potential employment opportunities and increased productivity.
slides.content3: Assisted learners in providing solutions, review codebase, ensure 100% completion of projects and assessments in which over 85% of the learners were able to achieve.

slides.title2: Data Biometrics Registration Officer, National Examinations Council (NECO)
slides.content2: Captured and registered over five thousand biometric data of Senior School Students for SSCE examination and also reported errors identified from the students records for proper correction and accuracy.
